job.title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p>ShortList Recruitment have partnered with a world leader in AI cloud security. We are looking for an experienced developer to join one of the fastest growing technology companies based in Austin. My client is looking for a confident self starter who is able to analyze complex problems and find creative solutions. You will have a start up mindset to be able to take on and solve new challenges.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>Skills</p><p><br></p><ul><li>Solid experience building and maintaining cloud based services in a CI/CD environment</li><li>Skilled in C/C++</li><li>Experience in a common backend language such as Python, Go, Rust, Java etc</li><li>Excellent communication skills</li></ul><p><br></p><p>The ideal candidate would reside in Austin, TX. My client is open to a flexible working environment. They have a swift interview process and are keen to hire immediately, the position pays a base salary up to $145,000 with a competitive benefits package.</p><p><br></p><p>Click APPLY NOW for immediate consideration!</p>
